recipe_name: Sesame-crusted tuna with broccoli and sweet potato
author: Gino D'Acampo
method: For the sauce, place the blueberries and white wine into the bowl of a food processor  and blend the ingredients until smooth. For the tuna, place the tuna, sesame seeds and egg yolk into a clean bowl.  Season the ingredients with salt and freshly ground black pepper and mix well. Heat the olive oil in a frying pan and cook the tuna for 2-3 minutes on each side, or until cooked through. To serve, place the broccoli and sweet potato onto a clean plate.  Place the tuna on top of the broccoli and sweet potato and pour the sauce over the top.
ingredients: 50g/1½oz blueberries,  2 tsp white wine,  100g/3½oz tuna steak,  1 tbsp sesame seeds,  1 free-range egg yolk,  salt and freshly ground black pepper ,  1 tbsp olive oil,  1 sweet potato, peeled, sliced into 2cm/¾in cubes and cooked until tender,  ½ broccoli head, blanched
